headline: OPEC+ Sits on Market Sidelines as Russian Invasion Sets Agenda
content: (Bloomberg) -- OPEC+ ministers gather on Wednesday in the unusual position of being oil-market observers, as the Russian invasion of Ukraine and a release of strategic fuel stocks by major consumers set the market’s agenda. headline: Dow futures, Treasury yields rise as Biden delivers State of the Union, vows to isolate Russia, fight inflation
content: Stock-index futures late Tuesday rose as President Joe Biden delivered a crucial State of the Union address, as war rages between the Ukraine and Russia.

headline: State of the Union: Joe Biden ignores Congress' push to ban lawmakers from trading stocks
content: President Barack Obama, his former boss, called for reforms exactly a decade ago in his State of the Union address.

headline: Dow Jones Futures: Fed Chief Powell On Tap As Russia's Ukraine Invasion Raises Rate-Hike Doubts
content: Stocks sold off Tuesday, while oil prices surged. Fed chief Jerome Powell testifies Wednesday as Russia's Ukraine invasion complicates monetary policy.

headline: Sea’s Market Decline Hits $132 Billion as Stock Tumbles Again

headline: Is Rivian Stock A Buy As It Hikes Prices Ahead Of Earnings Report?
content: Rivian's production ramp up is hampered by chip shortages but CEO R.J. Scaringe says the company is poised to grab 10% market share by 2030. Should you buy Rivian stock?

headline: 5 Best Chinese Stocks To Buy And Watch
content: Hundreds of Chinese companies are listed on U.S. markets. But which are the best Chinese stocks to buy or watch right now? JD.com , NetEase, Li Auto, Xpeng and BYD Co.. China is the world's most-populous nation and the second-largest economy with a booming urban middle class and amazing entrepreneurial activity.
